claim.text: ByteScience, a non-profit cloud-based auto fine-tuned Large Language Model (LLM) platform, extracts structured scientific data and synthesizes new scientific knowledge from vast scientific corpora.
claim.exact_quote: To address [this, we introduce ByteScience, a non-profit cloud-based auto fine-tuned Large Language Model (LLM) platform, which is designed to extract structured scientific data and synthesize new scientific knowledge from vast scientific corpora.

evidence.evidence_text: ByteScience utilizes the robust, scalable infrastructure of Amazon Web Services (AWS) to efficiently handle user requests and data processing.
evidence.location: III. ARCHITECTURE OF AWS CLOUD-BASED SERVICES
evidence.exact_quote: ByteScience utilizes the robust, scalable infrastructure of Amazon Web Services (AWS) to efficiently handle user requests and data processing.

evidence.evidence_text: The platform was built on Amazon Web Services (AWS) and provides an automated, user-friendly workflow for custom model development and data extraction.
evidence.exact_quote: The platform was built on Amazon Web Services (AWS) and provides an automated, user-friendly workflow for custom model development and data extraction.

claim.text: ByteScience achieves remarkable accuracy with only a small amount of well-annotated articles.
claim.exact_quote: The platform achieves remarkable accuracy with only a small amount of well-annotated articles.

evidence.evidence_text: Using 300 training samples reduced annotation time by 57% compared to a single sample.
evidence.limitations: Specific to annotation time, not overall accuracy
evidence.exact_quote: Using 300 training samples reduced annotation time by 57% compared to a single sample.

evidence.evidence_text: TABLE I: RESULT OF STRUCTURED DATA EXTRACTION, showing high precision, recall, and F1 scores for ByteScience
evidence.limitations: Limited to the specific tasks and models compared
evidence.exact_quote: TABLE I: RESULT OF STRUCTURED DATA EXTRACTION.

conclusion.key_limitations: Dependent on quality of annotated articles

claim.text: ByteScience streamlines the transition from the science literature to structured knowledge and data, benefiting the advancements in natural informatics.
claim.exact_quote: This innovative tool streamlines the transition from the science literature to structured knowledge and data and [benefits the advancements in natural informatics.]

evidence.evidence_text: This innovative tool streamlines the transition from the science literature to structured knowledge and data and benefits the advancements in natural informatics.
evidence.exact_quote: This innovative tool streamlines the transition from the science literature to structured knowledge and data and benefits the advancements in natural informatics.

claim.text: Traditional methods for extracting structured data from scientific texts are time-consuming and resource-intensive.
claim.exact_quote: Constructing databases from scholarly literature is crucial for modern research, but traditional methods are timeconsuming and resource-intensive.

evidence.evidence_text: Constructing databases from scholarly literature is crucial for modern research, but traditional methods are time-consuming and resource-intensive.
evidence.exact_quote: Constructing databases from scholarly literature is crucial for modern research, but traditional methods are time-consuming and resource-intensive.

claim.text: ByteScience enables users to create a customized data extraction tool in hours, achieving 80%-90% human accuracy.
claim.exact_quote: It can process a 10-page scientific document in one second, compared to the 20-30 minutes it takes a researcher. With an extraction cost of just $0.023 per paper for 10,000 articles, ByteScience makes large-scale data extraction affordable and accessible.

evidence.evidence_text: ByteScience makes large-scale data extraction affordable and accessible with an extraction cost of just $0.023 per paper for 10,000 articles.
evidence.limitations: Cost is a specific aspect of efficiency
evidence.exact_quote: ByteScience makes large-scale data extraction affordable and accessible with an extraction cost of just $0.023 per paper for 10,000 articles.

evidence.evidence_text: ByteScience enables users to create a customized data extraction tool in hours, achieving 80%-90% human accuracy.
evidence.exact_quote: ByteScience enables users to create a customized data extraction tool in hours, achieving 80%-90% human accuracy.

conclusion.key_limitations: Dependent on specific use cases and domains

claim.text: ByteScience accelerates discovery, enhances research decision-making, and fosters innovation across disciplines.
claim.exact_quote: This accelerates discovery, enhances research decision-making, and fosters innovation across disciplines.

evidence.evidence_text: ByteScience accelerates discovery, enhances research decision-making, and fosters innovation across disciplines.
evidence.exact_quote: ByteScience accelerates discovery, enhances research decision-making, and fosters innovation across disciplines.

conclusion.key_limitations: Assumes broad applicability without direct evidence
